rules.ruleString: (Must be enrolled in course type {09, 09-1, 09-4, 10} and Must be enrolled in course version {2894, 3288, 3469, 4637, P2001, P3002})
Must have passed 4 (I/W) units in {PSC1011, PSC1012, PSC2011, PSC2012}

description: This unit will introduce students to cancer cell biology. The specific topics covered include The Nature of Cancer, Cellular Oncogenes & Tumor Suppressor Genes, Growth Factor Receptors and Cytoplasmic Signalling, Multistep Tumorigenesis, and Invasion & Metastasis.
faculty: Faculty of Pharmacy and Pharmaceutical Sciences
